column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Although our restaurant might not have appeared busy at the time
column2: we will very often experience a rush of customers that will fill all of our 80 dining-room seats in less than 10 minutes. This happens more than you might think. Therefore
column3: to keep things fair for all of our guests
column4: we must adhere to a no-exceptions policy for seating incomplete parties.
